definition: ājñā or ajna, the brow or third eye chakra 查克拉, residing in the forehead/also written 眉間輪|眉间轮[mei2 jian1 lun2]

sentences.english: It is known as the Aajna Chakra in the language of Yoga.
sentences.chinese: 在瑜伽系统中，这里被称为眉心轮。

sentences.english: Marshal pointing to his brow, I am angry eyes at his eyes.
sentences.chinese: 血刀指着他的眉心，我愤怒的眸直指他的眼。

sentences.english: He jumped off the motorcycle and aimed a pistol between my eyes.
sentences.chinese: 他跳下摩托车，用一把手枪对准了我的眉心。

sentences.english: Again some between the eyebrowses that extend hand to fondle him.
sentences.chinese: 又有些心疼地伸手去抚他的眉心。

sentences.english: The inner brows lead the change, softening the shapes.
sentences.chinese: 眉心带领着变化，使整个形状开始放松。

sentences.english: She has an amazing outstretching voice that reaches far into the vast expanses of the world's middle- brow.
sentences.chinese: 她的拉长地嗓音可以触及世界眉心间的广阔区域。

definition: the flat area of forehead between the eyebrows/glabella
temple (on the sides of human head)
pit of the stomach/solar plexus/words and thoughts
the five fingers of one's hand
outer tip of the eyebrow/(facial) expression/(Tw) knack/trick of the trade
palm (of one's hand)/control (extended meaning from having something in the palm of one's hand)
